lore.breezebounce.inflation_machine: A functional block that keeps nearby Bounce Blocks inflated as long as it is fueled with Wind Charges.
tag.breezebounce.bounce_blocks.descripti: A bouncy block infused with a Wind Charge!
tag.breezebounce.bounce_stairs.descripti: A bouncy stair block infused with a Wind Charge!
tag.breezebounce.bounce_slabs.descriptio: A bouncy half block infused with a Wind Charge!
tag.breezebounce.bounce_walls.descriptio: A bouncy half block infused with a Wind Charge!
